hanzi-su-wiki:
梅

Значения

Слива

Мнемоника

Слива, дерево 木 для каждого 每. Лакомство для старых и лекарство для малых. Сгущенный сок незрелых плодов прекрасное жаропонижающее средство.

Варианты

梅, 楳, 槑
purpleculture_pinyin:
méi
plum; plum flower; Japanese apricot (Prunus mume)
слива; цветок сливы; Японский абрикос (Prunus mume)
rtega_mnemonic:
梅梅RS
X		plum, plum tree
  • the first blossoming tree 木, symbol of New Year and spring, eagerly awaited by everyone 毎

梅梅RSplums, prunes, surname
  • in spring almost every 毎 tree 木 seems to be a plum tree with blossoms
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 每 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
梅花 [ méi huā ]: plum blossom; clubs ♣ (a suit in card games); wintersweet (dialect)
黄梅戏 [ huáng méi xì ]: Huangmei opera (local opera of Anhui)
梅雨 [ méi yǔ ]: Asian rainy season; monsoon
杨梅 [ yáng méi ]: Yangmei town in Taoyuan county 桃园县 , north Taiwan
杨梅 [ yáng méi ]: red bayberry; Chinese bayberry; Japanese bayberry; Myrica rubra; Classifiers: 颗
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 每 [ měi ] each, every
heisig_chinese_memo: The mother tree is the small plum tree. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: plum, tree, wood, every, reclining, lying down, mother, breasts
heisig_story: Behind every Jack Horner's pie maker, a tree full of plums.
koohiiStory1: Plums actually grow on every single tree. What, you didn´t know that? They do. Orange trees, apple trees, cantaloupe trees. Plums are simply mutant fruits that have been installed in the root software of every single tree. I hear that some plum-loving scientists are working on a way to hack every tree´s genetic code so that every tree will bear nothing _but_ plums.
koohiiStory2: EVERY Japanese person asks you if you like UMEBOSHI. No I say, I prefer to eat my PLUMS fresh from the TREE.
jp_example_words:
梅干(うめぼし): dried plum
梅雨(つゆ): rainy season, rain during the rainy season
梅(うめ): plum, plum-tree, lowest (of a three-tier ranking system)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Aiming your gun out the window, you shoot at a tree filled with ume, Japanese plums. This is, in your opinion, the best way to harvest the plums – shooting at them out your window with a gun.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine picking fruit off an ume tree in this way – shooting them off the branches with your gun. Picture yourself aiming at the fruits as you hear the gunshots ring in your ears and the smell of gunpowder fills the air.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You’ve probably heard of ume before, depending on your exposure to Japan, but an ume (うめ) is a Japanese plum.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine eating your harvest of ume. Taste the ripe fruity flesh of these Japanese plums as you stuff your gluttonous face.
Ru_trainchinese: méi: (сущ) слива Муме, абрикос японский, зимоцвет
Kanshudo_mnemonic: (not) every (毎) tree (木) is a plum tree
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The mother tree is the small plum tree. &nbsp Every other tree came from it.&nbsp
humanum_full_description_en:
The ancient text of the character for " mei " is " some ", which means that there are sweet and sour plums growing on the tree, and " wood " is added as a symbol to make "楳". Thereafter, for the acoustic character " each " build " plum " word still in use.

Duan Yucai believes that plum can be interpreted as the " plum " of sour fruit, and it can also be interpreted as "枏", the same as " nan ", that is, the phoebe tree. "Shuowen": "Mei, 描 Ye. Edible. From the wood, every sound. Liao, or from a certain." Duan Yucai's note: "The plum of "Zhaonan" is also the sour fruit of today; "Qin", The plum in "Chen" is the nan tree today."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood " and " every ", the original meaning is plum tree and plum.
humanum_full_description:
「梅」字的古文字作「某」，表示樹上長着酸酸甜甜的梅子，後再加「木」為意符，造「楳」字。其後，換為聲符「每」，造「梅」字，沿用至今。

　　段玉裁認為，梅可解作酸果之「梅」，亦可解作「枏」，同「柟」，即楠樹。《說文》：「梅，枏也。可食。从木，每聲。楳，或从某。」段玉裁注：「《召南》之梅，今之酸果也；《秦》、《陳》之梅，今之楠樹也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「每」聲，本義是梅樹、梅子。

Duan Yucai believes that plum can be interpreted as the " plum" of sour fruit, and it can also be interpreted as " 枏", the same as " nan", that is, the phoebe tree. "Shuowen": "Mei, 描 Ye. Edible.     梅字的基本解释

    梅
    méi
    落叶乔木，品种很多，性耐寒，初春开花，有白、红等颜色，分五瓣，香味很浓，果实球形，味酸：梅花。梅子。
    姓。

    梅字的汉语字典释义

    [①]［méi］
    ［《廣韻》莫杯切，平灰，明。］
    “坆1”的今字。亦作“栂1”。亦作“楳1”。亦作“槑1”。“某2”的今字。
    (1)落叶乔木。种类很多。叶卵形，早春开花，以白色、淡红色为主，味清香。果球形，立夏后熟，生青熟黄，味酸，可生食，也用以制成蜜饯、果酱等食品。未熟果加工成乌梅，供药用。花供观赏。
    (2)指梅花。也指腊梅科的腊梅花。
    (3)指梅树的果实。可食，亦可用作调味品。
    (4)指柟木。即楠木。
    (5)谓盐梅。喻指宰辅重臣。
    (6)指杨梅。
    (7)悲酸貌。参见“梅目”。
    (8)节候名。
    (9)姓。

    梅字的英文翻译

    ◎ 梅
    plum

    梅字的康熙字典解释

    【辰集中】【木字部】　梅； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页528第08
    〔古文〕?槑【唐韻】莫杯切【集韻】【正韻】模杯切【韻會】謀杯切，?音枚。或作槑、楳，亦作?。【說文】枏也。【爾雅·釋木】梅，枏。【陸璣·條梅疏】似豫章大木也。又【書·說命】若作和羹，爾惟鹽梅。【禮·內則】梅諸。【名物疏】陸璣所釋有條有梅，自是枏木似豫章者。豫章，大樹可以爲棺舟者也。和羹之梅，籩實之乾䕩，似杏實酢者也。　又【爾雅·釋木】時，英梅。【註】雀梅。　又【爾雅·釋木】朹檕梅。【註】狀如梅，子赤色似小柰，可食。　又【埤雅】江、湘、兩浙四五月閒梅欲黃落，則水潤土溽，蒸鬱成雨，謂之梅雨。【四時纂要】閩人以立夏後逢庚入梅，芒種後逢壬出梅。　又楊梅，果名。【越郡志】會稽楊梅爲天下之奇。　又梅梅，猶昧昧，居喪之容也。【禮·玉藻】視容瞿瞿梅梅。　又州名，屬廣東。【南宋·地理志】改敬州爲梅州。　又姓。【廣韻】出汝南。漢梅福、梅鋗。　又【集韻】毋罪切，音浼。亦姓也。槑字原从二杲作。又?。

    考證：〔【書·說命】若作和羹，汝惟
    梅字的源字形

    梅字的起名意思

    ：寒梅，梅树，蔷薇科落叶乔木，暗香疏影，形容特别坚强，越是条件艰苦越是能完成任务的坚韧不拔的一种表现。

    plum
    Basic explanation of words
    plum
    méi
    Deciduous trees, many varieties, hardy, flowering in early spring, white, red and other colors, divided into five petals, strong fragrance, spherical fruit, sour: plum. plum.
    name.
    plum
    Chinese dictionary definition of words
    [①]［méi］
    ["Guangyun" Mo cup cut, flat gray, bright. ]
    The present character of "坆1". Also known as "栂1". Also known as "楳1". Also known as "槑1". The present word for "some 2".
    (1) Deciduous trees. many kinds of. The leaves are ovoid and bloom in early spring. They are mainly white and light red with a delicate fragrance. The fruit is spherical, ripe after the beginning of summer, green, ripe and yellow, sour in taste, and can be eaten raw. It is also used to make preserves, jams and other foods. Unripe fruits are processed into ebony plum for medicinal use. Flowers for viewing.
    (2) Refers to plum blossoms. Also refers to the winter plum flower of the winter plum family.
    (3) Refers to the fruit of plum trees. It is edible and can also be used as a condiment.
    (4) Refers to nanmu. Namely nanmu.
    (5) It is called salt plum. Yu refers to Zaifu and heavy ministers.
    (6) Refers to bayberry.
    (7) Sad and sour appearance. See "Mayme".
    (8) Festival name.
    (9) Last name.
    plum
    English translation of words
    ◎ Plum
    plum
    plum
    Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
    [Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梅; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 528 08
    [Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Mo Cup Cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Mold Cup Cut [Yun Hui] Seek Cup Cut, Sound Piece. Or for 槑, 楳, also for ?. [Said the text] Nan also.     plum
    Source glyph
    plum
    Name meaning
    : Winter plum, plum tree, Rosaceae deciduous tree, dark fragrance and shadow, describe particularly strong, the more difficult the conditions, the more tenacious performance that can complete the task.
    梅
    梅
    甲骨文
    (méi)
    只要想起一生中后悔的事,梅花就落
    了下来。
    小篆
    梅
    “梅”是个象形兼形声字,本义是梅树的果实。《山海经。中山经》中“灵
    山其木多桃李梅杏”。意思就是灵山上长着很多桃树、李树、梅树和杏树。金
    文的“梅”,下方是个“木”字,表示和树木相关,上方是一个植物果实的形
    状,代表梅树上结出的酸梅果。小篆的“梅”,变成了左形(木)右声(每)
    的形声字。“梅”后来也代指梅花,如“梅亭”,就是观赏梅花的亭阁。
    隶书

    слива
    слива
    (méi)
    Пока я вспоминаю сожаления в своей жизни, цветы сливы будут падать.
    слива
    «Мэй» является пиктографическим и пиктофонетическим персонажем, и его первоначальное значение - плод сливового дерева.
    "Шан Хай Цзин.
    «В Линшане много персиков, слив, слив и абрикосов» в «Чжуншань Цзин».
    Это означает, что на Лингшане растет много персиковых, сливовых, сливовых и абрикосовых деревьев.
    «Слива» в надписях из золота, нижняя часть - это слово «дерево», что означает, что оно связано с деревьями, а верхняя часть представляет собой форму плода растения, который представляет плоды кислой сливы, произведенные на сливе. дерево.
    «Мэй» Сяочжуаня стало пиктофонетическим персонажем с левой (дерево) и правой (каждая) формой.
    «Мэй» позже также назывался цветками сливы, например «Павильон Мэй», который представляет собой павильон для наблюдения за цветками сливы.
    слива
    Курсив
    méi
    I сущ.
    1) дикая (кислая) слива; сливовое дерево; слива (дерево и плод)
    梅叶 листья сливы
    梅园 сливовый сад
    2) бот. абрикос муме (Armeniaca mume Sieb.)
    梅李 муме и слива
    3) сливовый уксус, кислая приправа
    盐梅 соль и кислая приправа; солёный и кислый
    4) дождливый сезон
    芒种后逢丙入梅, 小暑后逢未出梅 после сезона колошения хлебов (7—8 июня) наступает сезон дождей, а после начала сезона малой жары (7—8 июля) сезон дождей прекращается (断梅)
    II собств.
    1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 梅县) Мэйсянь (уезд в пров. Гуандун)
    2) Мэй (фамилия)
    Radicals: 木, 毋  (tree, window, gun)
    Meaning Mnemonic
    Aiming your gun out the window, you shoot at a tree filled with ume, Japanese plums. This is, in your opinion, the best way to harvest the plums – shooting at them out your window with a gun.
    Imagine picking fruit off an ume tree in this way – shooting them off the branches with your gun. Picture yourself aiming at the fruits as you hear the gunshots ring in your ears and the smell of gunpowder fills the air.
    Reading Mnemonic
    You’ve probably heard of ume before, depending on your exposure to Japan, but an ume (うめ) is a Japanese plum.
    Imagine eating your harvest of ume. Taste the ripe fruity flesh of these Japanese plums as you stuff your gluttonous face.
